components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Ooredoo Network in Myanmar

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Ooredoo Network in Myanmar. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Ooredoo Network in Myanmar. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Nigeria, Mali, Ghana, Cte d'Ivoire, Ethiopia, Uganda, Rwanda, Cameroon, Afghanistan, Benin, Zambia, Liberia, the Republic of the Congo and Swaziland is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 April 2025 at 16:00 PDT until 01 April 2025 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Nigeria, Mali, Ghana, Cte d'Ivoire, Ethiopia, Uganda, Rwanda, Cameroon, Afghanistan, Benin, Zambia, Liberia, Republic of the Congo and Swaziland handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting an emergency maintenance from 01 April 2025 at 16:00 PDT until 01 April 2025 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States handsets via United States long codes and short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 April 2025 at 16:15 PDT until 01 April 2025 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

incident_updates.body:
The SFR network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 April 2025 at 21:00 PDT until 02 April 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from SFR France handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom SMS Carrier Maintenance - O2

incident_updates.body: The O2 network in the United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 April 2025 at 14:30 PDT until 02 April 2025 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from O2 United Kingdom handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance activity: We would be updating the TaskRouter database version in the US1 region. There are pre and post activities around this maintenance and hence this longer maintenance window. The actual database cut-over is expected to take approximately 3 minutes and would incur a downtime of less than 1 minute.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after this maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 5 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - TaskRouter

scheduled_maintenances.name: Austria, United Kingdom and Italy Account Security Carriers Partners Maintenance - Drei, Three and Wind Tre

incident_updates.body:
Our carriers partners Drei Austria, Three United Kingdom and Wind Tre Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 02 April 2025 at 21:30 PDT until 02 April 2025 at 23:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Drei Austria, Three United Kingdom and Wind Tre Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 April 2025 at 05:00 PDT until 10 April 2025 at 08:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Singapore handsets via subset of Singapore short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The SingTel network in Singapore is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 25 March 2025 at 10:00 PDT until 01 April 2025 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from SingTel Singapore handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

25 March 2025 at 10:00 PDT until 25 March 2025 at 14:00 PDT
01 April 2025 at 10:00 PDT until 01 April 2025 at 14:00 PDT
